title: Interactive Exercise
description:
Create a ListModifier context manager that:
- Accepts a list as input
- Backs up the list on entry
- Allows modifications in the context
- Restores the original list if an exception occurs
- Keeps modifications if no exception
instructions:
Create a ListModifier context manager that:
- Accepts a list as input
- Backs up the list on entry
- Allows modifications in the context
- Restores the original list if an exception occurs
- Keeps modifications if no exception

hints.text: Use list.copy() to backup. In the except block, restore the list using list[:] = backup to modify in-place.

commonMistakes.correction: Add : at the end of the line
